title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Developing Elementary Social Studies Teaching Strategies Using Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in pedagogy and understanding of elementary social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core principles of microlearning and its empirically validated effects in higher education
Learners can design a 5-minute social studies microlearning module in a VR simulation environment
Learners can develop microlearning assessment tools that enhance learner engagement using digital devices
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
